message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. It's a fantastic deal for something of this value.
I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
